title: [K-12] Emotional Impact of Anatomy Practicals and Professional Growth

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic anatomy and experience in healthcare/social welfare fields
context.additional_context: A course exploring the emotional impact of anatomy practicals using VR and simulation tools, with comparative analysis of actual dissection and prosection methods.

learning_goals: Learners can recognize emotional responses during anatomy practicals and explain methods to transition them into professional attitudes
Learners can compare the emotional impact differences between VR simulation and prosected-based learning approaches
Learners can propose strategies to enhance empathy and professional responsibility toward vulnerable populations based on anatomy practical experiences
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
